question: Which state tourism of India has hosted the first-ever AdventureNext 18 in Asia?
explanation: The AdventureNext India 2018, the first-of-its-kind in India & Asia,  was hosted by  Madhya Pradesh Tourism  at the new International Convention Centre (Minto Hall) in Bhopal on December 3-5. The event was organized by United states based Adventure Travel Trade Association (ATTA). The theme of the 2-day event was ‘Pulse of Tomorrow’. The international event  was focused on adventure tourism by combining marketplace (chowk Bazar), meetings, networking opportunities, inspirational speakers and educational sessions together for national and international delegates. Over 200 delegates participated in the event.
